ActJudges Act
SubjectBarbara E. Macdonald ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. James A. Macdonald
PrecisGranting of an annuity to BARBARA E. MACDONALD, widow of the Hon. James A. Macdonald, Judge of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective December 15, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
